Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Northbound Reroute near Vincennes/115th
ShortDescription: Northbound 111 111th/King Drive  buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 112th Place and Vincennes: due to, street blockage near Vincennes/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #111 111th/King Drive  buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 112th Place and Vincennes: due to, street blockage near Vincennes/115th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago,   #67 67th-69th-71st  Temporary Westbound Reroute near 69th/Calumet
ShortDescription: WB 30 South Chicago,  67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Calumet.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #30 South Chicago,  #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Calumet.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line Service Delayed near Oakton
ShortDescription: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are still standing near Oakton due to an obstruction. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are still standing near Oakton due to an obstruction.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #97 Skokie

  • Also, shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service from Howard to Skokie in both directions

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Monroe
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Monroe due to unauthorized person on tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Monroe due to unauthorized person on tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
